column4: guys can i install the latest ubuntu on my netbook or is it not possible yet
because about 2 weeks ago i came here and people were all like no you can't install ubuntu on ur netbook
I hear you. However, I did install 10.10 on a Toshiba NB305 (a netbook).
but there was some kind of a tackle with that piece of software you use to install ubuntu
whats the name of the other software you use to install it
I used a CD, not the USB flash drive thingy.
it didn't work when i tried it two weeks ago
oh i dont have a cd in my netbook ..........
so let me reask peoplez on this channel, anyone here got ubuntu installed on a non cdrom netbook?
i am talking about the new unr release of course
No, netbooks tend not to have CD-ROM drives. They do, however, have USB ports, and there are CD-ROM drives that come with USB sockets. :)
ill stick to my windows 7 then :o
